snippet: Although the carmaker will exit the North American market due to low sales volumes, Suzuki's United States sales were up 22 percent in November when compared with November 2011.
abstract: Although the carmaker will exit the North American market due to low sales volumes, Suzuki's United States sales were up 22 percent in November when compared with November 2011.

headline.main: Suzuki Reaches Settlement Pacts With 97% of Its Dealers
